join lily."user" o_user on a.o_user = o_user.id

mapper.insert: insert into asset( uid, gid, mode, acl, priority, flags, "state", creation, lastmod, "version", t0, t1, "year", art, region, batch, qty, serial, expire, o_user, o_group, o_org, o_orgunit, o_person ) values( #{ownerUserId}, #{ownerGroupId}, #{accessMode}, #{acl}, #{priority}, #{flags}, #{state}, #{creationDate}, #{lastModified}, #{version}, #{beginTime}, #{endTime}, #{year}, #{artifactId}, #{regionId}, #{batch}, #{quantity}, #{serial}, #{expire}, #{userId}, #{groupId}, #{orgId}, #{orgUnitId}, #{personId} );
